Class Answer

java.lang.Object
application.Answer
public class Answer extends Object
Represents an answer to a question in the application.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Answer(String text, String user)
    Constructs an Answer with the given text and user.

    Method

    Retrieves the user who posted the answer.

    Marks this answer as a solution to the question.
    String
    toString()
    Returns a string representation of the answer, indicating the author and whether it is a solution.

    update(String newQuestion)
    Updates the text of the answer if the current user matches the author.

  • Constructor Details

    • Answer

      public Answer(String text, String user)
      Constructs an Answer with the given text and user.
      Parameters:
      text - The content of the answer.
      user - The user who posted the answer.

  • Method Details

    • getText

      public String getText()
      Retrieves the text of the answer.
      Returns:
      The answer text.

    • getUser

      public String getUser()
      Retrieves the user who posted the answer.
      Returns:
      The username of the answer's author.

    • update

      public String update(String newQuestion)
      Updates the text of the answer if the current user matches the author.
      Parameters:
      newQuestion - The new text to update the answer with.
      Returns:
      A message indicating success or failure of the update.

    • setSolution

      public void setSolution(boolean solution)
      Marks this answer as a solution to the question.
      Parameters:
      solution - true if the answer is a solution, false otherwise.

    • getSolution

      public boolean getSolution()
      Checks if this answer is marked as a solution.
      Returns:
      true if the answer is a solution, false otherwise.

    • getAnswerId

      public String getAnswerId()
      Retrieves the unique identifier of the answer.
      Returns:
      The answer ID as a string.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the answer, indicating the author and whether it is a solution.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the answer.
